News

Apr 7th 2020
BarinVar! Our new work is published in Cell Reports (link). Multi-omics study to the development of human prefrontal cortex.

Jan 23th 2020
Very excited to present our new work in Cell (link). This is the largest gene discovery of autism spectrum disorder using whole exome sequencing.

Oct 28th 2019
Dahae, Yujin, Ganghee, and Seoyeon joined the team for undergraduate internship. Welcome!

Sep 1st 2019
Yeonji from the Seoul National University Hospital joined the team for the clinical genomics project. Welcome!

Jul 1st 2019
Lizzy, Yerim and Yong-Jin joined the team for undergraduate internship. Welcome!

May 2nd 2019
Joon An got an Young Investigator Award at International Society for Autism Research (INSAR) 2019 .

Mar 22th 2019
Happy to share our preprint about BrainVar. We produced paired WGS and RNAseq from the human dorsolateral prefrontal cortex of 176 neurotypical individuals across prenatal and postnatal development! Werling et al. 2019 on bioRxiv.

Dec 13th 2018
New paper! An et al. 2018 published in Science, highlights the role of promoters in autism.

Dec 1st 2018
Our work with the Autism Sequencing Consortium identifies 102 autism genes, paper submitted to BioRxiv .
